channel.title: Need help compileing and runing runescape server
channel.description: need help @echo off TITLE EasyRSC set PATH=%PATH%;ant\bin ant runserver pause

item.title: Need help compileing and runing runescape server
item.dc:creator: @Vibes Vibes
item.description:
@Vibes wrote:

[quote=“freaky5000, post:2, topic:436763”]Download JDK 1,6u29

Download Apache-ant.

Update your environmental variables, classpath/path to the location of your java/bin.

Go into the the apache-ant/bin folder wherever you have decided to store it open the ant.bat go to the end and add a pause.

The compiler only needs ant compile and the server only needs ant runserver depending on how the build file is.

If you require anymore information I’ll be glad to get a teamviewer session going and help you with this.[/quote]
There is also alot of tutorials aroun these forums that will help you do just this. search button

Read full topic
item.source: Need help compileing and runing runescape server

item.title: Need help compileing and runing runescape server
item.dc:creator: @freaky5000 freaky5000
item.description:
@freaky5000 wrote:

Download JDK 1,6u29

Download Apache-ant.

Update your environmental variables, classpath/path to the location of your java/bin.

Go into the the apache-ant/bin folder wherever you have decided to store it open the ant.bat go to the end and add a pause.

The compiler only needs ant compile and the server only needs ant runserver depending on how the build file is.

If you require anymore information I’ll be glad to get a teamviewer session going and help you with this.

item.title: Need help compileing and runing runescape server
item.dc:creator: @james4370 james4370
item.description:
@james4370 wrote:

need help @echo off
TITLE EasyRSC
set PATH=%PATH%;ant\bin
ant runserver
pause
